main.blocks:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <variables>
    <variable type="" id="KS??AT,)XE}zm/7@Daj8">item</variable>
    <variable type="" id="58~.@TjAF0:+q;s~=|zJ">a</variable>
  </variables>
  <block type="pxt-on-start" x="0" y="0">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="basic_show_icon">
        <field name="i">IconNames.Heart</field>
        <next>
          <block type="device_set_servo_pin">
            <field name="name">AnalogPin.P16</field>
            <value name="value">
              <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                <mutation min="0" max="180" label="Value"></mutation>
                <field name="SLIDER">95</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="dfplayermini_connect">
                <field name="pinRX">SerialPin.P13</field>
                <field name="pinTX">SerialPin.P15</field>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="function_definition" x="635" y="145">
    <mutation name="前进" functionid="n*F?,2txEtKYNQf+Cz]o"></mutation>
    <field name="function_title">函数</field>
    <field name="function_name">前进</field>
    <statement name="STACK">
      <block type="motor_MotorRun">
        <field name="index">motor.Motors.M1</field>
        <field name="Dir">motor.Dir.CW</field>
        <value name="speed">
          <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
            <mutation min="0" max="255" label="Speed"></mutation>
            <field name="SLIDER">50</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="motor_MotorRun">
            <field name="index">motor.Motors.M2</field>
            <field name="Dir">motor.Dir.CW</field>
            <value name="speed">
              <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                <mutation min="0" max="255" label="Speed"></mutation>
                <field name="SLIDER">50</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="motor_MotorRun">
                <field name="index">motor.Motors.M3</field>
                <field name="Dir">motor.Dir.CCW</field>
                <value name="speed">
                  <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                    <mutation min="0" max="255" label="Speed"></mutation>
                    <field name="SLIDER">50</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
                <next>
                  <block type="motor_MotorRun">
                    <field name="index">motor.Motors.M4</field>
                    <field name="Dir">motor.Dir.CCW</field>
                    <value name="speed">
                      <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                        <mutation min="0" max="255" label="Speed"></mutation>
                        <field name="SLIDER">50</field>
                      </shadow>
                    </value>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="device_forever" x="-6" y="261">
    <statement name="HANDLER">
      <block type="controls_if">
        <mutation else="1"></mutation>
        <value name="IF0">
          <shadow type="logic_boolean" id=",RPf]f`iB,;9)-bZTw;3">
            <field name="BOOL">TRUE</field>
          </shadow>
          <block type="logic_compare">
            <field name="OP">LT</field>
            <value name="A">
              <shadow type="math_number" id="R;haP5!Ke=;PvGICJ}Gw">
                <field name="NUM">0</field>
              </shadow>
              <block type="sonar_ping">
                <field name="trig">DigitalPin.P8</field>
                <field name="echo">DigitalPin.P12</field>
                <field name="unit">PingUnit.Centimeters</field>
              </block>
            </value>
            <value name="B">
              <shadow type="math_number">
                <field name="NUM">10</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="DO0">
          <block type="motor_motorStopAll">
            <next>
              <block type="device_pause">
                <value name="pause">
                  <shadow type="timePicker">
                    <field name="ms">500</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
                <next>
                  <block type="dfplayermini_press">
                    <field name="myPlayType">dfplayermini.playType.Play</field>
                    <next>
                      <block type="device_pause">
                        <value name="pause">
                          <shadow type="timePicker">
                            <field name="ms">1500</field>
                          </shadow>
                        </value>
                        <next>
                          <block type="function_call">
                            <mutation name="左移" functionid="+S-/~M?dtCxxLy_8[T=%"></mutation>
                            <field name="function_title">调用</field>
                            <field name="function_name">左移</field>
                            <next>
                              <block type="device_pause">
                                <value name="pause">
                                  <shadow type="timePicker">
                                    <field name="ms">500</field>
                                  </shadow>
                                </value>
                                <next>
                                  <block type="function_call">
                                    <mutation name="前进" functionid="n*F?,2txEtKYNQf+Cz]o"></mutation>
                                    <field name="function_title">调用</field>
                                    <field name="function_name">前进</field>
                                  </block>
                                </next>
                              </block>
                            </next>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <statement name="ELSE">
          <block type="function_call">
            <mutation name="前进" functionid="n*F?,2txEtKYNQf+Cz]o"></mutation>
            <field name="function_title">调用</field>
            <field name="function_name">前进</field>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="function_definition" x="644" y="473">
    <mutation name="左移" functionid="+S-/~M?dtCxxLy_8[T=%"></mutation>
    <field name="function_title">函数</field>
    <field name="function_name">左移</field>
    <statement name="STACK">
      <block type="motor_MotorRun">
        <field name="index">motor.Motors.M1</field>
        <field name="Dir">motor.Dir.CW</field>
        <value name="speed">
          <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
            <mutation min="0" max="255" label="Speed"></mutation>
            <field name="SLIDER">200</field>
          </shadow>
        </value>
        <next>
          <block type="motor_MotorRun">
            <field name="index">motor.Motors.M2</field>
            <field name="Dir">motor.Dir.CW</field>
            <value name="speed">
              <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                <mutation min="0" max="255" label="Speed"></mutation>
                <field name="SLIDER">200</field>
              </shadow>
            </value>
            <next>
              <block type="motor_MotorRun">
                <field name="index">motor.Motors.M3</field>
                <field name="Dir">motor.Dir.CW</field>
                <value name="speed">
                  <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                    <mutation min="0" max="255" label="Speed"></mutation>
                    <field name="SLIDER">200</field>
                  </shadow>
                </value>
                <next>
                  <block type="motor_MotorRun">
                    <field name="index">motor.Motors.M4</field>
                    <field name="Dir">motor.Dir.CW</field>
                    <value name="speed">
                      <shadow type="math_number_minmax">
                        <mutation min="0" max="255" label="Speed"></mutation>
                        <field name="SLIDER">200</field>
                      </shadow>
                    </value>
